content: Australian actor based in Singapore (born 1990)This biography of a living person **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help by adding reliable sources. Contentious material about living persons that is unsourced or poorly sourced **must be removed immediately** from the article and its talk page, especially if potentially libelous. *Find sources:* "Joshua Tan" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(July 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Joshua Tan Wei En** (born 19 August 1990) is an [Australian](/wiki/Australians) actor and singer based in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## Career Tan has become a local celebrity after the successes of *[Ah Boys to Men](/wiki/Ah_Boys_to_Men_(film_series))* movie series as Ken Chow by director [Jack Neo](/wiki/Jack_Neo). ## Personal life Tan was born in [Melbourne](/wiki/Melbourne), [Australia](/wiki/Australia) but was raised in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). He has a degree from Melbourne's [Monash University](/wiki/Monash_University). He married Zoen Tay on 26 December 2022. ## Filmography ### Film YearTitleRoleNotesRef2012*[Ah Boys to Men](/wiki/Ah_Boys_to_Men)*Recruit Ken Chow2013*[Ah Boys to Men 2](/wiki/Ah_Boys_to_Men_2)*2014*Hong Baos and Kisses*Xavier Tan2015*Ah Boys to Men 3: Frogmen*Recruit Ken Chow2016*[Long Long Time Ago](/wiki/Long_Long_Time_Ago)*Corporal Ken ChowCameo*[Young & Fabulous](/wiki/Young_%26_Fabulous)*Hao Ren2017*[Ah Boys to Men 4](/wiki/Ah_Boys_to_Men_4)*Corporal First Class Ken Chow ### Television series YearTitleRoleNotesRef2015*Lion Mums*Marcus Lim2016*A Selfie's Tale*Hans Lee Hao Nan2017*[Lion Mums 2](/wiki/Lion_Mums_2)*Marcus Lim2018*You Can Be An Angel 3*Ray Lee Yingjie 李英杰2019*[How Are You?](/wiki/How_Are_You%3F_(TV_series))*Ouyang Ming 欧阳明*Lion Mums 3*Marcus Lim2020*Best Friends Forever*Ouyang Jie 欧阳杰*How Are You 2*Ouyang Ming 欧阳明2021-22*Lion Mums 4*Marcus Lim2022*[Little Women](/wiki/Little_Women_(2022_TV_series))*Hotel receptionistCameo2023*Mr Zhou's Ghost stories @ Job Haunting II*Ah Qiang 阿强 ### Variety YearTitleRole2017*Super 100*Himself ### Theater YearTitleRoleRef2017Flying Through TimeTiger ## Awards and nominations YearCeremonyCategoryNominated workResultRef2021[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2021)[Top 10 Most Popular Male Artistes](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Top_10_Most_Popular_Male_Artistes)—N/aNominated - Joshua Tan at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - Joshua Tan on [Instagram](/wiki/Instagram_(identifier)) This article about a Singaporean actor is a stub. title: Joshua Tan
